title: SHARP SMC1461KB Oven with Removable 12.4" Carousel Turntable, Cubic Feet, 1100 Watt Countertop Microwave, 1.4 CuFt, Black
description: Sharp's roomy family-sized SMC1461KB 1.4 cu. Ft. 1000W countertop microwave oven has a bigger Capacity to cook and reheat larger portions of food. Innovative features including a sensor cook menu, soften options, Auto defrost and the carousel turntable system make preparing your favorite foods, snacks and beverages easier. With decades of experience designing smart innovative microwaves, it’s easy to see why home cooks throughout the world trust SHARP carousel.
